The backlash people like @DavidLammy get for speaking out about Comic Relief reminds me of when disabled people critique ‚Äòpity porn‚Äô fundraising. There‚Äôs a certain section of society that is deeply threatened by a minority group not being ‚Äògrateful‚Äô and stepping out our place.
